description: Adversaries may attempt to make an executable or file difficult to discover or analyze by encrypting, encoding, or otherwise obfuscating its contents on the system or in transit. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Obfuscated Command Line Using Special Unicode Characters
query: process.command_line:(*â* OR *€* OR *£* OR *¯* OR *®* OR *µ* OR *¶*)
